## Steps to resilence

- Understand Exposure
- Assess Vulnerability & Risk
- Investigate Options
- Prioritize & Plan
- Take Action

::: footer
More resources: [U.S. Climate Resilience Toolkit](https://toolkit.climate.gov/#steps)
:::


## NYC heat plan case

- Assess climate risks
- Incoporate climate risks in adaptation and response plan
- Educate residents on the threats
- Re-assing vulnerability

What elese can we do?
